definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: IV. We must make a wise choice between Mt. Sinai and Mt. Zion.
sentences.chinese: 信徒要从西乃山与锡安山之间作智慧的选择。

sentences.english: He had gone get the two tables of stone on which God wrote the Ten Commandments.
sentences.chinese: 他去了西乃山并拿到了与神立约二块法版。

sentences.english: Sinai and got the Ten Commandments or Laws on two tablets of Stone.
sentences.chinese: 摩西上西乃山从神那里领受刻在石版上的十诫或律法。

sentences.english: Moses went up Mount Sinai and got the Ten Commandments or Laws on two tablets of Stone.
sentences.chinese: 摩西上西乃山从神那里领受刻在石版上的十诫或律法。

sentences.english: God spoke to them at Sinai and had brought the people to the promised land.
sentences.chinese: 神在西乃山向他们说话，又带领百姓进入应许之地。

sentences.english: And the Lord spoke to Moses in mount Sinai, saying.
sentences.chinese: 上主在西乃山训示梅瑟说。

sentences.english: We're leaving the wilderness around Mount Sinai, because we see the pillar of cloud is moving on!
sentences.chinese: 我们要离开西乃山的旷野，因为云柱又在动了。

sentences.english: These are the precepts which the Lord commanded Moses for the children of Israel in mount Sinai.
sentences.chinese: 这是上主在西乃山为以色列子民向梅瑟吩咐的法令。

sentences.english: Do not return to Mt. Sinai.

definition: tabernacle (biblical word for a meeting hall or tent)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Book of Numbers/Fourth Book of Moses
Book of Deuteronomy/Fifth Book of Moses
Gideon (name, from Judges 6:11-ffoll.)/also written 吉迪恩
